title: Ready to lease! 1 bed 1 bath home. Check us out!
posting_body: ['Brookside Park Apartments', '565 Saint Johns Ave Sw', 'Atlanta, GA 30315', 'A wonderful home in Atlanta is waiting for you!', 'We currently have a gorgeous 1 bedroom 1 bathroom renting for $1652 per month.', 'This unit comes with 830 sq ft.', "Brookside Park Apartments is Atlanta's best kept secret that is conveniently located to great shopping, entertainment, and minutes away from the Nation's Largest Airport and Downtown Atlanta!", 'Professionally managed by Ventron Management, our 1, 2 and 3 bedroom apartments offer very unique features in an area.', 'Residents of this community enjoy full size washer and dryer connections, and multiple renovations and much more!', 'Brookside Park boasts amenities that make living here both comfortable and convenient!', 'show contact info', 'Community Highlights:', '❖ BBQ/Picnic Area', '❖ Clubhouse w/WIFI', '❖ Conference Room', '❖ Controlled Access Entry', '❖ Fitness Center', '❖ Grill', '❖ Pet Care', '❖ Planned Social Activities', '❖ Property Manager on Site', '❖ Wi-Fi at Pool and Clubhouse', '❖ Access to Marta', '❖ Corporate Suites', '❖ Custom Paint Tone', '❖ Fax/Copy Services', '❖ Maintenance on site', '❖ Minutes from Downtown Atlanta', '❖ Picnic Areas and Gazebo', '❖ Preferred Employer Discounts Available', '❖ Public Transportation', '❖ Roommate Style Floor Plans Available', 'Unit Highlights:', '❖ Cable Ready', '❖ Carpet', '❖ Dishwasher', '❖ Disposal', '❖ Multi Use Room', '❖ Oven', '❖ Range', '❖ Trash Compactor', '❖ Walk-In Closets', '❖ Window Coverings', '❖ Brushed Nickel Lighting', '❖ Eat-in Kitchen', '❖ Fully Equipped Kitchens', '❖ Granite Inspired Countertops', '❖ Handrails', '❖ High Speed Internet Access', '❖ Intrusion alarms', '❖ Refrigerator/Freezer', '❖ Renovated Suites Available', '❖ Upgrade Complete', 'Contact:', 'show contact info', 'Website:', '<URL>/', 'Leasing Options:', '6-Month, 10-Month, 11-Month, 12-Month', 'Pet Policy:', 'Brookside Park Apartments is a pet friendly community that welcome two pets per apartment home.', 'The pet fee is $300 non-refundable per pet.', 'There is a $15 monthly pet fee.', 'A pet addendum must be completed and pet fees must be paid prior to moving in.', 'If there is more than one pet per unit, the combined weight of the 2 pets cannot exceed 50 lbs.', 'Breed restrictions may apply.', 'Management:', 'Ventron Management', 'Non-Refundable Admin Fee $135', 'EQUAL HOUSING OPPORTUNITY', '331DCF95D1CD4C']
